General.Name: Kimbell Royalty Partners LP
General.Description: Kimbell Royalty Partners, LP, together with its subsidiaries, engages in acquiring and owning mineral and royalty interests in oil and natural gas properties in the United States. The company serves as the general partner of the company. Kimbell Royalty Partners, LP was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Fort Worth, Texas.
General.Address: 777 Taylor Street, Fort Worth, TX, United States, 76102
